channel.title: Standard runescape exp rates?
channel.description: I want my servers exp multiplier to be similar to real oldschool rs but I dont know the multiplier numbers. Can anyone help or point me in the right direction?

item.title: Standard runescape exp rates?
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

HP: 4/3 Damage
ATK/STR/DEF/RNG = Damage*4/#ofstats given too(excludes hp)

ATk/STR/DEF would be 4/3*Damage (if controlled, all get equal exp)
if RNG/DEF would be (4/2)damage, or 2damage

Magic has a formula, baseXP + dependent on damage done.
Don’t remember it off hand though.

Read full topic

item.title: Standard runescape exp rates?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

For combat:
If not controlled, it is damage * 4 to Att or Str or Def, with damage * 1.33 to HP.
If controlled, it is Damage * 1.33 to Att & Str & Def & HP.

For the rest of the skills, you’ll want to use the wiki to figure out what you’re supposed to get for each action

Read full topic
